title: Spaced Repetition Apps: Anki and Beyond
description: A fast breakdown of Spaced Repetition Apps: Anki and Beyond for builders.

hook.text: Medical students swear by Anki like a religion. Some have 100-day streaks of daily reviews.

buildup.text: Spaced repetition software schedules reviews at optimal intervals based on your performance.

discovery.text: The algorithm shows cards right before you'd forget themâ€”maximizing memory with minimum time.

twist.text: The tool is only as good as the cards: poorly written flashcards create poorly learned facts.

climax.text: Students using SRS retain 2-3x more information than those using traditional review methods.

punchline.text: The algorithm knows when you'll forget. Your job is to show up.

quiz.question: How does spaced repetition software optimize learning?
options: It schedules reviews right before you would forget, maximizing retention with minimum time
It plays audio recordings while you sleep
It replaces the need for understanding with pure memorization
